text: See https://roamresearch.com/#/app/developer-documentation/page/W4Po8pcHQ get API Key. now, sign export : https://relemma-git-feat-frontdesk.roamresearch.com/#/app

title: Roam Backend API (beta) Wrapper
code: library(roamR)  # set credentials Sys.setenv(ROAM_GRAPH = "<YOUR-GRAPH-NAME>") Sys.setenv(ROAM_API_KEY = "<YOUR-API-KEY>")  # get all pages in the graph as a tibble  pages <- roam_q(query = "[:find ?p ?title :where [?p :node/title ?title]]",                  set_names = FALSE)

Low-level Roam Backend API Wrapper function for q route — roam_q
code: roam_q(   query,   graph = Sys.getenv("ROAM_GRAPH"),   key = Sys.getenv("ROAM_API_KEY"),   verbose = FALSE,   format = c("tibble", "parsed", "json"),   set_names = FALSE )
